long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Comicsansd will randomly change the font on pages to Comic Sans for a few seconds before reverting back to the original font.

HINT: install this in your (preferably graphic designer) friends browser, not your own.
